bill.title: Small Boat Harbors; Commercial Vessels; Development
bill.description: Allows for the lease of fast and submerged lands at Ala Wai Boat Harbor. Permits the limited issuance of commercial use permits for vessels with assigned moorings in Ala Wai and Keehi boat harbors. Provides for future moorage fees to be established by appraisal by a state-licensed appraiser. Directs the Department of Land and Natural Resources to lease fast lands and submerged lands at Ala Wai Boat Harbor using the request for proposals process. Effective July 1, 2011. (HB1566 CD1)

history.action: (H) Introduced and Passed First Reading
